nodes.text: The Isatabith rain forest was located on the Core World of Alderaan. The rain forest was one of multiple Alderaanian locations that were described to Imperial pilot Thane Kyrell by his friend Nash Windrider during the latter's efforts to extol the planet's natural beauty and list its best places to visit. Kyrell later thought of both the rain forest and the Cloudshape Falls as potential destinations for he and his friend just before witnessing the destruction of Alderaan in 0 BBY, where the forest was destroyed as well.
The Isatabith rain forest was mentioned in the 2015 novel Lost Stars, written by Claudia Gray.
